name: Rundat
description:
A virus has sucked your friend into a computer game and the only way to save them is to jump in and parkour your way around popups, pipes, falling columns, defeat the boss and cleanse the game world... or live in it forever?! D:

+ Collect bits to summon the boss. Defeat the boss to get a new ability and advance to the next stage then do it all over again and again with more abilities and tougher bosses and level parts until the escape portal spawns!

+ Frantically shoot "L" Pointer Bullets at hazards and bosses to avoid being nullified! 

+ Wall run, slide and boost past falling hazards, doors, pipes, popups, boss bullets and more or just use your firewall shield to block them! You never run out of boost btw... for the speedrunners😳

+ Complete chat requests (quests) to earn Zipped Folders (lootboxes) and unzip them to earn new characters, bosses, lobby rooms and music. Or get all that unlocked right away when you donate over $5 OR  join my Patreon and get even more :) <3

+ Collect all the achievement badges for completing all the game modes and unlocking all the character cards, boss cards, music cards and more! Badges display in your lobby and on the chat tab!

8 Playable Characters - Bruh, Pixie, Papo, Russell, Stonky, Shibuchan, Demon Lord and Lil Baddie 😩

9 Bosses - Kilo, Abayomi, Kyoki, Blocky, Nikola, Godsix, Xenobia, Virona and Chompy 😈

4 Lobby Rooms - Digi Cafe, Lil Baddie's Room, Club Matrix and Reboot Arcade 🏠

7 Beats -  digiCafe BGM, Time to Run w/ sample from LouisBernades, Kilo Bytes, Sunrise w/ sample from  lofivan, Midway w/ sample from kellymoon, Last Life and Cold Nightmare 🎵 * All samples from looperman.com. Full OST on my Soundcloud if you wanna take a listen.

+ It's Endless! You can keep going forever with increased amount of bits required to spawn the boss, boss health and popups multiplied by the level number.

+ Race Mode: Race against infinitely increasing difficulty bots to prove your the fastest runner in the whole game world! *Race mode level parts are more simple to account for my poor AI programing abilities... lol BUT stay tuned for a multiplayer version coming in the future with epic parkour level parts, ranking, etc!

+ ASMR Mode: Turn off the music and enjoy the mostly chill ASMR trigger sounds of sliding, wind blowing by, soft rain and thunder, arcade ambience, subtle breaking of objects and more. * Occasional explosion and glitch sounds of course lol

+ The arcade in the game is full of blank arcade games 🤔... Get your art on them! Top Speedrunner will be forever immortalized in the game! Contest announcements coming soon. Join the Discord for now or start posting on the Subreddit if u want lol.. 

Twitter   Twitch   Youtube   Instagram  More

I made this game all by myself and it took roughly a year so any support would be greatly appreciated <3 This is my first game and it's only the beginning! I've decided this is what I want to do and will be making more games very soon so please stay tuned or come with me on this journey!

Join my Patreon  to get every bonus character, boss, lobby, soundtrack and game mode right away. Also, be in future updates and new games as game items & more!

+ Get the FBX models of the characters, bosses and more when you join the top tier.

Follow my Socials  for a chance to get the fully unlocked version for free and be in my next game as a game item! 

Join the Discord  for updates, speedrun and art contest announcements and more!

A special thanks to all the people who have been there during the streams, the progress posts and dev logs, commenting and hyping me up. I know I kept stalling but its finally out now haha! ...and again thanks yo... for real <3
